29ab387f3e01d60f009ab2484ac5f1f9 (02:03): about these lilo / grub loaders, i find it very appealing that ROS uses its own unique loader
bc1644a667fed2d4947fc9b454e78747 (02:04): grub/lilo cant create all the crap that ntldr creates before boot, that windows needs
bc1644a667fed2d4947fc9b454e78747 (02:04): thats why they chainload ntldr
